alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 3:58PM CDT until June 23 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Van, Edom, Redland, Myrtle Springs, Ben Wheeler, Whitton, Phalba, Jackson, Oakland, Walton, Jones, Primrose, Pruitt, Tundra, Colfax, Martins Mill and Wise. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 520 and 542. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
